hero.title: Inzira yawe ku byishimo bitazibagirana ku isi!
hero.subtitle: Menya isi hamwe na Exodus: Umufatanyabikorwa wawe mu ngendo!

whyChooseUs.title: KUKI UDUHITAMO?
whyChooseUs.description: Izina ry'ikimenyetso ushobora kwizera no kuzariraho

about.title: Ibyerekeye Old Fox Company
about.experience_title: Igisubizo cy'Urugendo na Old Fox Company
about.experience_description_1: Twifatanye mu rugendo rutazibagirana ruzana ibitekerezo byiza ndetse no gukura mu mwuka. Ubufasha bwacu bw'ingendo bwita ku bantu, imiryango, n'amatsinda agashaka umubano urenze usanzwe n'ukwemera kwabo.
about.experience_description_2: Tumaze imyaka myinshi, tuzi ibyo abagenzi bacu bakeneye, duha abakiriya bacu ibihe byihariye by'ingenzi bigezweho. Ikipe yacu ifite umwete ikaba ari hano kugira ngo ikurikirane intambwe zawe zose, ikaguha ubufasha mu rugendo rwuzuye ibyishimo n'ubwenge.

footer.description: Sura isi hamwe na Exodus: Umufatanyabikorwa wawe wizewe mu ngendo!
